org.drip.sample.credit

Class StandardCDXAPI

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.drip.sample.credit.StandardCDXAPI

  • public class StandardCDXAPI
extends java.lang.Object
    StandardCDXAPI contains a demo of the CDS basket API Sample. It shows the following: - Construct the CDX.NA.IG 5Y Series 17 index by name and series. - Construct the on-the-run CDX.NA.IG 5Y Series index. - List all the built-in CDX's - their names and descriptions. - Construct the on-the run CDX.EM 5Y corresponding to T - 1Y. - Construct the on-the run ITRAXX.ENERGY 5Y corresponding to T - 7Y. - Retrieve the full set of date/index series set for ITRAXX.ENERGY.
